00015 class ORRunContext
00016 {
00017 
00018   friend class ORRunDataProcessor;
00019   friend class ORDataProcManager;
00020   /* These classes are managers and so they have access to the protected 
00021    * members of ORRunContext.  This is to improve data hiding. */
00022   public:
00023     enum EState { kIdle, kStarting, kRunning, kStopping };
00024 
00025     ORRunContext(ORHeader* header = NULL, const char* runCtrlPath = NULL);
00026     virtual ~ORRunContext();
00027 
00028     virtual std::string GetClassName() { return fClassName; }
00029     virtual int GetRunNumber() const { return fRunNumber; }
00030     virtual bool IsQuickStartRun() const { return fIsQuickStartRun; }
00031     virtual int GetRunType() const { return fRunType; }
00032     virtual int GetStartTime() const { return fStartTime; }
00033     virtual const ORHeader* GetHeader() const { return fHeader; }
00034     virtual const ORHardwareDictionary* GetHardwareDict() const { return fHardwareDict; }
00035     virtual inline bool MustSwap() const { return fMustSwap; }
00036     virtual inline bool IsRecordSwapped() const { return fIsRecordSwapped; }
00037 
00038     virtual int* GetPointerToRunNumber() { return &fRunNumber; }
00039     virtual inline EState GetState() { return fState; }
00040     virtual Int_t WriteBackToSocket(const void* buffer, size_t nBytes);
00041 
00042     // for use by a managing process
00043     // FIXME: allow only ORRunDataProcessor to call this?
00044     virtual void SetRecordSwapped() { fIsRecordSwapped = true; }
00045     
00046 
00047   protected:
00048     virtual void ResetRecordFlags() { fIsRecordSwapped = false; }
00049     virtual bool LoadHeader(ORHeader* header, 
00050       bool ignoreRunControl = false,
00051       const char* runCtrlPath = "ObjectInfo:DataChain");
00052       /* Returns true if success, false if not. */
00053     virtual void LoadRunStartRecord(UInt_t* record);
00054     virtual void SetWritableSocket(ORVWriter* aSocket) { fWritableSocket = aSocket; }
00055 
00056     /* To be called at the beginning of each record by a managing processor. */
00057     virtual void SetIdle();
00058     virtual void SetStarting();
00059     virtual void SetRunning();
00060     virtual void SetStopping();
00061     virtual void SetMustSwap(bool mustSwap) { fMustSwap = mustSwap; } 
00062 
00063     ORHeader* fHeader;
00064     ORHardwareDictionary* fHardwareDict;
00065     std::string fClassName;
00066     int fRunNumber;
00067     bool fIsQuickStartRun;
00068     bool fIsRecordSwapped;
00069     bool fMustSwap;
00070     int fRunType;
00071     int fStartTime;
00072 
00073     ORVWriter* fWritableSocket;
00074 
00075     EState fState;
